SELECT p.PRIVIL_ID, p.PRIVIL_PID, p.NAME, p.TYPE, p.PROGRA_CODE, p.PRIORI, p.STATUS FROM sys_staff s LEFT JOIN sys_staff_csmpvg sc ON s.STAFF_ID=sc.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN sys_privil p ON p.PRIVIL_ID = sc.PRIVIL_ID left join sys_staff_positi sp on s.staff_id=sp.staff_id WHERE s.STAFF_ID= #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.PRIVIL_ID IS NOT NULL and sp.positi_id= #{positiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION SELECT p.PRIVIL_ID, p.PRIVIL_PID, p.NAME, p.TYPE, p.PROGRA_CODE, p.PRIORI, p.STATUS FROM sys_staff s LEFT JOIN sys_staff_positi sp ON s.STAFF_ID=sp.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN sys_positi_privil pp ON pp.POSITI_ID=sp.POSITI_ID LEFT JOIN sys_privil p ON pp.PRIVIL_ID=p.PRIVIL_ID WHERE s.STAFF_ID= #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.PRIVIL_ID IS NOT NULL and sp.positi_id= #{positiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY PRIORI
